JojaHasExtraStock.Letter.Text: @,^^I am pleased to inform you that JojaMart's stock has been expanded to include basic cooking ingredients, some fishing gear, and coal! Aren't you thrilled?^I look forward to seeing you shopping more at your local JojaMart!^^-Mr. Morris, Manager^Pelican Town JojaMart
JojaHasExtraStock.Letter.Title: Joja Has Extra Stock
